#summary Description of parameters

=Parameters for entity finding and profiling=
Commands `ef` and `ep`.

==Obligatory parameters==

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Possible values* || *Related parameter(s)* || *See also* || 
|| `index` || Location of the Lemur/Indri index || (location) || || || 
|| `model` || Association finding model. || `1` = Model 1 <br> `2` = Model 2 || || [Models] ||
|| `associationFile` || File with document-entity associations || (location) || `associationFileFormat` || GeneratingAssociations || 
|| `queryFile` || File with queries (topics) || (location) || `queryFileFormat` || ||
|| `smoothingMethod` || Smoothing method || `jm` = Jelinek-Mercer<br> `dirichlet` = Dirichlet || `smoothingParam` || || 
|| `outputFile` || Output file || (location) || `outputFileFormat` || ||

==Optional parameters==
===All models===
|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Possible values* || *See also* || 
|| `associationFileFormat` || Association file format || `0` (default), `1`, `2`, or `3` || FileFormats ||  
|| `entityAliasMapping` || File defining a mapping of `EntityAlias` values to `EntityID`-s.<br>Obligatory, when associationFileFormat is set to 2 or 3. || (location) || EntityRepresentation || 
|| `queryFileFormat` || Query file format || `0` (default), `1`, `2`, or `3` || FileFormats ||  
|| `outputFileFormat` || Output file format || `0` (default), `1` || FileFormats ||  
|| `outputNum` || Number of results to output<br>(entities for entity finding, topics for entity profiling) || default: all results || ||
|| `runID` || runID for TREC style output files (`outputFileFormat=0`) || || FileFormats ||

===Model 2 (only)===
|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Possible values* || *See also* || 
|| `topDocNum` || Number of top relevant documents considered per query. Default: all documents considered. || (positive int) || [Models] ||
